ca.uqac.lif.labpal

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.Group

  • public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of experiments, linked together under a name. Groups have no effect on a lab or its experiments. They are simply there to help organize a set of experiments. Experiments that belong to the same group will be displayed together in the interface.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé
